sentences.english: Huating succulent beef tender, nutrient-rich, delicate elastic cortex.
sentences.chinese: 華亭肉牛肉質細嫩，營養豐富，皮質細膩彈性好。

sentences.english: Huating County to resume in November 1961.
sentences.chinese: 一九六一年十一月恢復華亭縣。

sentences.english: The Huating Temple, the largest Buddhist temple in Kunming, is also in the Western Hills.
sentences.chinese: 華亭寺是昆明最大的佛寺，也位於西山。

sentences.english: So as the twin cities of Shanghai and Huating.
sentences.chinese: 於是上海和華亭成爲雙子城。

sentences.english: This is Zhang Ming, a receptionist from Huating Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我是華亭賓館的接待員張明。
